describe: Estonia is a Northern European country bordered by the Baltic Sea and Gulf of Finland. Known for its medieval architecture, digital advancements, and beautiful natural landscapes, Estonia is a blend of history and modernity.

cities.name: 🏝 Tallinn
cities.geographical_location: Northern coast of Estonia, along the Gulf of Finland
cities.climate: Humid continental climate with mild summers and cold, snowy winters

cities.name: 🌆 Tartu
cities.geographical_location: Southeastern Estonia, on the banks of the Emajõgi River
cities.climate: Humid continental climate with warm summers and cold winters

cities.name: 🏝 Pärnu
cities.geographical_location: Southwestern Estonia, on the coast of Pärnu Bay
cities.climate: Oceanic climate with mild summers and cool winters
cities.famous_cuisine: Pärnu-style fish dishes and local pastries
